channel.title: 317 [PI] Pest Control
channel.description:
Hello,
My pest control code [url=http://pastebin.com/3HrFZX4X]http://pastebin.com/3HrFZX4X[/url]
project insanity 317 pi
The whole day i am trying to add pest control fix bugs, but i am still at the same result when i begon. I have a couple issues that i need help with.
1) if i kill the portal the npc keep staying like that but i can`t hit him anymore, already tried that: http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?72843-317-PI-Pest-Control-Portal-fix
2) The countdown is of the portals is bugged. (picture is only to show wich countdown) [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rd9e6c.png[/img]
3) This Countdown (if you can call it a countdown) isn`t working [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ms0foo.png[/img]
4) If i killed every portal it is not teleporting, i think that comes becuz the npc isn`t dissapearing.
I have no errors in eclipse, if someone could help me i would appreciate that Thank you

project insanity 317 pi

The whole day i am trying to add pest control fix bugs, but i am still at the same result when i begon.
